result.title: Abnormal progroam is running!I cannot find the cause!Ask for help!
result.content:
//Idenmpotent functions

include <stdio.h>

define N 200

int main() { int i,n,j,a[N],p,x,y; scanf("%d",&n); for (i=0;i<n;i++) { scanf("%d",&a[i]); } // for (i=0;i<n;i++) // printf("%d ",a[i]); for (i=1;i<=n;i++) { if (i==10)

if (i==1&&a[i-1]==a[a[i-1]-1]);
    {
       printf("%d",i);
       return 0;
    }
    if (i>1)
    {
       p=a[a[i-1]-1];
       for (j=1;j<=2*i;j++) 
       {
         if (j==i-1)
            x=p;
         p=a[p-1];
     }
       y=p;
     if (x==y)
           printf("%d",i+1);
        return 0;
    }

} return 0; } Whatever you entered!This sentence"if (i==1&&a[i-1]==a[a[i-1]-1]);"will be always true! So the program will end when i=1,then I confusue!
